import pandas as pd
import geopandas as gpd
source.bfc57449:
data = gpd.read_file('../input/mineral-ores-around-the-world/Mineral ores round the world.csv')
pd.set_option('display.max_columns', len(data.columns))

data.sample(10)
source.d3c45983:
TenMostCommonMinerals = data.commod1.value_counts().head(10)
TenMostCommonMinerals.plot(kind='bar',figsize=(15,5), title='10 most common minerals (by "commod1" column)');
source.7d1dc6f5:
data['lat'] = pd.to_numeric(data['latitude'])
data['lon'] = pd.to_numeric(data['longitude'])

data['geometry'] = gpd.points_from_xy(data.lon, data.lat)
